text: Tomas Altamirano Duque (9 September 1927 – 3 March 2021) was a Panamanian politician. He was the First Vice President of Panama from September 1, 1994 to September 1, 1999, under President Ernesto Pérez Balladares. He was a member of the Democratic Revolutionary Party. Altamirano Duque died in Panama City on 3 March 2021, aged 93.Falleció el exvicepresidente Tomás Gabriel Altamirano Duque ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Vice presidents of Panama
title: Tomas Altamirano Duque
